content: I actually have a few other plants that I've been tending to. I've got a spider plant that I pruned and propagated a few weeks ago, and I've been enjoying some fresh herbs from my herb garden. I also recently tidied up my herb garden, which had gotten a bit out of control, and replanted some of the herbs in a new pot with better drainage. Oh, and I almost forgot - I've been meaning to get a humidifier for my living room, as I've noticed that the dry air has been affecting my plants.
